Translations.Text: Guru sastira purbe ami abasya'i taderake laghu sasti asbadana karaba, yate tara pratyabartana kare.
Ye byaktike tara palanakartara ayatasamuha dbara upadesa dana kara haya, atahpara se ta theke mukha phiriye neya, tara ceye yalema ara ke? Ami aparadhiderake sasti deba.
Ami musake kitaba diyechi, ata'eba apani kora'ana praptira bisaye kona sandeha karabena na. Ami eke bani isara'ilera jan'ye patha pradarsaka karechilama.
Tara sabara karata bidhaya ami tadera madhya theke neta manonita karechilama, yara amara adese patha pradarsana karata. Tara amara ayatasamuhe drrha bisbasi chila.
Tara ye bisaye mata birodha karache, apanara palanakarta'i keyamatera dina se bisaye tadera madhye phayasala debena.
Ete ki tadera cokha kholeni ye, ami tadera purbe aneka sampradayake dhbansa karechi, yadera bari-ghare era bicarana kare. Abasya'i ete nidarsanabali rayeche. Tara ki sone na
tara ki laksya kare na ye, ami usara bhumite pani prabahita kare sasya udagata kari, ya theke bhaksana kare tadera jantura ebam tara ki dekhe na
tara bale tomara satyabadi hale bala; kabe habe e'i phayasala
baluna, phayasalara dine kapheradera imana tadera kona kaje asabe na ebam taderake abakasa o deya habe na.
Ata'eba apani tadera theke mukha phiriye nina ebam apeksa karuna, tara'o apeksa karache.
